service.name: scenario-generator-v1
service.description: A simplified meta-scenario that generates Vrooli scenarios using Claude Code AI

claude-code.purpose: AI-powered scenario generation and code creation

steps.name: base-setup
steps.description: Execute generic setup (e.g. network, system, git)

steps.name: initialize-database
steps.run: cd initialization && psql -h localhost -p ${RESOURCE_PORTS[postgres]} -U postgres -d postgres -f postgres/schema.sql || echo 'Database schema initialization completed'

steps.name: check-claude-code
steps.run: bash ${VROOLI_ROOT:-/home/matthalloran8/Vrooli}/scripts/resources/agents/claude-code/manage.sh --action health-check --check-type basic || echo 'Claude Code not available - generation features will be limited'
steps.description: Verify Claude Code availability for AI generation

steps.name: show-urls
start-api
steps.description: Start Go API server in background

steps.name: wait-for-api
steps.description: Wait for API to be ready

steps.name: start-ui
steps.description: Start React UI in development mode

steps.name: show-running-services
stop-services
steps.run: pkill -f 'go run main.go' || true; pkill -f 'npm start' || true

steps.name: confirm-stop
steps.run: echo 'ðŸ›‘ Scenario Generator V1 services stopped'
